description: ITOA Custom dashboard: Host and Service variables defined from monitoring link

targets.query: SELECT mean("value") FROM /^$command$/ WHERE ("hostname" =~ /^$hostname$/ AND "metric" =~ /^$Metrics/ AND "service" =~ /^$service$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "hostname"

list.definition: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "$command"  WITH KEY = "hostname" WHERE service =~ /$service/
list.label: Host
list.name: hostname
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "$command"  WITH KEY = "hostname" WHERE service =~ /$service/

list.definition: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "$command"  WITH KEY = "metric"  WHERE service =~ /$service/ AND hostname =~ /$hostname/
list.label: Metrics
list.name: Metrics
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "$command"  WITH KEY = "metric"  WHERE service =~ /$service/ AND hostname =~ /$hostname/

title: Service: Diskspace
